SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.google.ase.terminal
Class EmulatorView

java.lang.Object
  View
      com.google.ase.terminal.EmulatorView

 class EmulatorView
extends View

A view on a transcript and a terminal emulator. Displays the text of the transcript and the current cursor position of the terminal emulator.

append

public void append(char[] receiveBuffer,
                   int base,
                   int length)
Accept a sequence of bytes (typically from the pseudo-tty) and process them.

Parameters:
receiveBuffer - a byte array containing bytes to be processed
base - the index of the first byte in the buffer to process
length - the number of bytes to process

page

public void page(int delta)
Page the terminal view (scroll it up or down by delta screenfulls.)

Parameters:
delta - the number of screens to scroll. Positive means scroll down, negative means scroll up.

pageHorizontal

public void pageHorizontal(int deltaColumns)
Page the terminal view horizontally.

Parameters:
deltaColumns - the number of columns to scroll. Positive scrolls to the right.
